name: CubeExit
description:
Escape the previous room to release a new lock cube.
- various cute characters
- easy joy stick controls
- memorize type brain development
- increase agility
- extremely fun and addictive


How to play
- check the map when the game starts
- check 'my location', 'escape room' and 'trap room'.
- move on the 'escape room' to complete. Make sure you have to watch out the 'trap room'
